name: Neocade Rush
description:
A minimalistic, roguelite, bullet hell game, inspired by the likes of Binding of Isaac and Vampire Survivors.

Defeat ever waves of enemies, take down bosses, acquire abilities and repeat as long as you can last!

To start off, this is a little project of mine that I've worked on for a bit. It's nowhere near a finished game. I decided to post this here to see if this is something people would be interested in playing, so if you give it a go and have some feedback for me please do go ahead and let me know what you think!

With that out of the way; the current version features waves of enemies that get progressively more difficult, 4 bosses, 3 playable characters and 18 abilities.

Controls:

WASD to move, Shift while moving for more precise movement, Left Mouse button to shoot, Q, Right Mouse button and E to use abilities and Space to toggle time distortion.
